title: Tree of survival
creator_credit: Abdellatif Ben Ammar and United Nations Films
brief_description: Examines the causes of the spread of the desert in the Sahel region in Niger and shows the migration of the people of the artea to the town. Concentrates on the positive action being taken to enable the people to survive in the rural area such as tree planting.
